title: Lucas Bravo
summary: Lucas Nicolas Bravo (born 26 March 1988) is a French actor and model. He is best known for starring in the Netflix romantic comedy series Emily in Paris (2020–present) as chef Gabriel, Emily's downstairs love interest. He is also known for his roles in the  comedy-drama Mrs. Harris Goes to Paris (2022) and the romantic comedies Ticket to Paradise (2022), and The Honeymoon (2022).
